backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining feature specs, data models, access control, and initial user profile queries with placeholder storage structures.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs with metadata for Phase 1 planning and skeleton pages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Quick reference list summarizing several frontend files including privacy page, global styles, and Tailwind config.
frontend/docs/data-architecture.md: Documentation describing entities, relationships, storage maps, access control, and data flows for the IC backend.
frontend/docs/design-direction.md: Design guide detailing dark‑fantasy aesthetics including colors, typography, spacing, shadows, and interactive behaviors.
frontend/docs/local-storage-strategy.md: Document outlining naming conventions, versioning, and categories for frontend local‑storage usage.
frontend/docs/phase1-features-by-page.md: Phase 1 feature list describing skeleton requirements and future enhancements for each site page.
frontend/docs/phase1-planning.md: Outlines the site map, access levels, and core phase‑1 features for a dark‑fantasy themed web app.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and layout styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s routing structure with all public, user, and admin routes and wraps it in a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and session clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Profile setup modal allowing users to submit name and email via a saveProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Route guard that checks authentication and admin role before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Simple auth gate that prompts login if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout with background layers, header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with site links, branding, legal links, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header navigation component showing links, login, and admin/dashboard options based on authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDrafts.ts: Manages saving, loading, and expiring form drafts in localStorage per form ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, products, orders, saved artifacts, and admin operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentlyViewed.ts: Tracks and stores a capped list of recently viewed products in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Stores and restores session-scoped state in localStorage with automatic session ID and expiry.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables defining light/dark palettes and fantasy-themed colors.
frontend/src/lib/localStorage.ts: Utility for versioned, expiring, and safely handled localStorage operations including get, set, remove, and cleanup helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with sections describing the story, mission, community, and values of Arcane Artifacts.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard showing product, order, and user stats with tabbed management views using data from custom queries.
frontend/src/pages/BlogLore.tsx: Displays a list of lore-themed blog posts with categories, dates, and excerpts.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with a message form and cards showing email, location, and business hours.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard with profile setup flow and tabs for profile details, order history, and saved artifacts.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: Renders a FAQ page with a searchable accordion of preset questions and a contact call-to-action.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Displays the landing page with hero section, feature highlights, and featured collection cards.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Provides a placeholder privacy policy with sections on data use, security, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Shows a grid of service offerings with icons, descriptions, feature lists, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Implements the shop page with product fetching, search UI, view mode toggle, and recently viewed items.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Contains placeholder terms of service with structured legal sections and a disclaimer note.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s planning state, including sitemap, features, design direction, data architecture, and required assets for the dark‑fantasy themed app.
